SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Congratulations! The page '{0}' has been created at the location '{1}'. The page has been added to the project-config.json file.
SUCCESS_MESSAGE_NAVIGATION_ADDED: The page has also been added to navigation menu. You can change the navigation styles in the project-config.json file.
SUCCESS_MESSAGE_CONCLUSION: If web server (ex: npm script ‘start’) is running, restart to load the new page.

ERRORS.SOMETHING_WENT_WRONG: Something went wrong. Either input values are missing/incorrect, or the program stopped intentionally/accidentally. Please try again.
ERRORS.ERROR_IN_FOLDER_PATH: Something went wrong with the input values for the folder path. Please check the folder path and try again.
ERRORS.PROGRAM_STOPPED_OR_UNKNOWN_ERROR: Either input values are missing/incorrect, or the program stopped intentionally/accidentally.
ERRORS.PAGE_NAME_LENGTH: Page Name is mandatory and must contain a minimum of {0} characters and a maximum of {1} characters.
ERRORS.PAGE_NAME_MANDATORY: Page Name is mandatory, must start with a letter, and can contain letters, numbers, spaces, underscore(s), and hyphen(s).
ERRORS.PAGE_EXISTS_IN_PROJECT_CONFIG_JSON: Page already exists in the project-config.json file. Please enter a new page name.
ERRORS.WIDGET_EXISTS_IN_PROJECT_CONFIG_JSON: Widget name already exists for a widget in the 'project' folder. Please enter a new page name.
ERRORS.PAGE_DISALLOWED_KEYWORDS: Page / Widget / Module file already exists in the 'template' folder. Please enter a new page name.
ERRORS.PAGE_NAME_EMPTY_IN_REQUEST: Page name is empty. Page Name is mandatory, must start with a letter, and can contain letters, numbers, spaces, underscore(s), and hyphen(s).
ERRORS.PAGE_NAME_INVALID_ENTRY: Page name does not meet the expected criterion. {0}
ERRORS.ADD_TO_MENU_EMPTY_IN_REQUEST: Menu Option is empty. Valid values are 'Y' or 'y' and 'N' or 'n'.
ERRORS.ADD_TO_MENU_INVALID_ENTRY: Invalid Menu Option. Valid values are 'Y' or 'y' and 'N' or 'n'.
ERRORS.MESSAGE_TITLE:
Following error(s) were found in the command line statement:
 {0}
ERRORS.HTML_FILE_EXISTS: File with the name '{0}' already exists in the path '{1}'. No Page Created.

VALIDATIONS.GET_ADD_TO_MENU_MESSAGE: Please confirm that the new page should be added to Page Navigation
VALIDATIONS.GET_ADD_TO_MENU_HINT_YES: Adds a menu item to the navigation menu
VALIDATIONS.GET_ADD_TO_MENU_HINT_NO: A Page is created without adding menu item to the navigation menu
